thread.title: Tesla sticks by Model 3 target, narrower Q4 loss

title: Tesla sticks by Model 3 target, narrower Q4 loss
text:
Tesla sticks by Model 3 target, narrower Q4 loss Thursday, February 08, 2018 - 01:14 
Tesla says it's sticking with Chief Executive Elon Musk's revised production targets for its Model 3 sedan, cheering investors who have put up with two delays. But, as Ciara Lee reports, the electric automaker's plans to raise spending this year underscored its growing need for cash. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
